text: Sir Probyn Ellsworth Inniss MBE (18 November 1936 â€“ 12 March 2017) was the Governor of Saint Christopher-Nevis-Anguilla from 1975 to 1980. Following the separation of Anguilla, he served as the Governor of Saint Christopher and Nevis from 1980 to 1981. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Saint Kitts and Nevis politicians Category:Governors
title: Probyn Inniss
